description:
- We cannot let that happen again. -
Holy Magistrate Keter—the one who leads the heavens under the Almighty`s will—tells Uriel of Lucifer`s planned rebellion. Initially in disbelief, Uriel then learns that the accusations against Lucifer may be connected to an event that once threatened to shatter the heavens...
Source: Official YouTube

titles.title: 天界に鳴り響く不協和音
